**We** <FONT COLOR="#FF0000">**Love**</font> <FONT COLOR="#0000FF">**Servers**</font>
**Where Quality Meets Affordability!**
<FONT COLOR="#FF0000">New Years Sale!</font>
 
Happy New Year, and welcome to WeLoveServers.net, where quality meets affordability. Recently, WeLoveServers has expanded VPS hosting services to California [Los Angeles]!
 
2013 is  here, and here at WeLoveServers we would like to celebrate the new year by extending a couple VPS specials. Start the new year off with a brand new VPS from WeLoveServers! When compared to our retail packages we sell, this calculates to **OVER** a 50% **recurring discount**.
 
_________________________________________________________________
 
 
<FONT COLOR="#0000FF">**Rudolph Plan**</FONT>
 
- 80 GB Disk Space Storage
- 1500 GB Bandwidth (100Mbps)
- 2048 MB DDR3 RAM
- 1 IPv4 Address
- SolusVM Access
- Full Root Access
- Choice of Linux OS's
- Instant Setup
- Self Managed
 
Monthly Price:$6.49/Month
Quarterly Price: $6.17/Month
Semi-Annual Price: $6.00/Month
Annual Price: $5.83/Month  _<FONT COLOR="#0000FF">(BEST Value!)</FONT>_
 
Link: https://core.weloveservers.net/cart.php?a=add&pid=19
 
_________________________________________________________________

- 50 GB Disk Space Storage

Annual Price:$3.33/Month  _<FONT COLOR="#0000FF">(BEST Value!)</FONT>_
 
Link: https://core.weloveservers.net/cart.php?a=add&pid=16

<FONT COLOR="#FF0000">**BONUS:**</font>
 Order the **Rudolph** and receive a free upgrade to **1Gbps Port**! To claim the free upgrade please open a support ticket/email support. We aim to have all VPSs network speed upgraded within 24 hours or less.

**Located in Los Angeles, California - Test IP: 192.210.148.2**
